p: Escherichia coli O157 ( E. coli) and Listeria monocytogenes CICC21633 ( L. monocytogenes) were used as the test bacteria. All samples were dissolved in 1% acetic acid. The antimicrobial activity was evaluated by the inhibition zone assay in agar medium with Oxford cup method, and 200 μl of sample was loaded on each oxford cup (Hu et al., 2017).
